name: Hack & Honeymoon
description:
You Need 8 Hearts to Win!

In Joinovia, newlyweds embark on a perilous adventure in lieu of a honeymoon. You are a matchmaker and you must balance matching couples with similar interests with matching couples who can survive their honeymoon adventure.

The stats of each adventurer are displayed through bar graphs in the panel below them. Their interests can be found in sliders below their stats, with the location of the heart marker indicating their preference.

Match couples with similar interests, but with dissimilar stats, such that they will cover each others' weaknesses on their adventure. Have fun!

Score to win: 8 hearts

Max score possible: 19 hearts

Max score achieved in testing: 12 hears (let us know if you beat us!)
